attributes.action: Re-open and Renovate Hyde Skate park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re-opening and Renovation of Hyde skate park , (Hyde , Tameside)
I speak for alot of people who would like this park to re-open , i know a lot of people around the area that want it open to the public again

For many beginners it is a death trap, for some it is a bit difficult to to find if they aren't locals

We have spoken to a company called Wheelscape who would be more than happy to back us.
